name: Seconds to Square
description: Seconds to Square is a momentum-based action-platformer where players draw boxes to manipulate time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Card with DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
